Rise and shine, Mister Freeman. Rise and... shine. Not that I... wish to imply you have been sleeping on the job. No one is more deserving of a rest, and all the effort in the world would have gone to waste until... well, let's just say your hour has... come again.
The right man in the wrong place can make all the difference in the world. So, wake up, Mister Freeman. Wake up and...

Um dos melhores jogos que eu já joguei, simplesmente fenomenal, literalmente tudo nele é perfeito, antes eu até estava com um pouco de receio pra jogar mas esse jogo valeu cada centavo e hora gasto
A OST, gráficos, IA dos inimigos, jogabilidade, física, literalmente sem nenhum bug, história ótima, final épico, nada nesse jogo não é no mínimo excelente
Tudo valeu muito a pena, se puderem joguem

el juego es simplemente hermoso, no solo fue bueno en 2004 sino que también es mejor que muuuuchos juegos actuales, suena de viejo pero es ultra entretenido, las fisicas son muy lol y está re bien hecho, me gusta el pan con salsa

Haven't played this title, shame, because it is Epic.

Best game to play classic rock, 80's metal, slowed synth-pop. Felt like I've witness new Indiana Jones. 
From the gameplay aspect i can say that you can effectively cover NPC's from the grenades blast with your body and kick ass after, big plus. Last time I had story this fun I was 12. I do not know shit about writing review, i know no one will read this, but I am writing from amazement anyway.
Music i listened during game:
Mission <Water Hazard> and <Highway> ,,Motley Crue-Kickstart My Heart'' / ,,Judas Priest-Hellion,Electric Eye'' / ,,Canon in D major-Metal version by Dettfinalwish'' / ,,Myslovitz-Chłopcy'' / ,,Little Richard-Long Tall Sally''. At the ending i played ,,Lana Del Rey-Summertime Sadness-slowed and reverb'', i thought it fits as the credits started rolling. 

Now I know why people want Half Life 3, and now I am one of them.
great game
